Reviews.Title: Never received the item
Reviews.Author: mildred
Reviews.Content: The worst deal I have ever made. I never received the phone and still I'm strugling in order to get my money back. I just received from the supplier (Buying it) a lot of excuses but not a solution to the problem. I had to rate it with one star because the program requested it to rate with something, but to me it is ZERO star.

Reviews.Title: Value For Money
Reviews.Author: carydb
Reviews.Content: Good entry level touch screen phone. Light weight and not bulky. Used it with my Sim card from Asia, and it works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Good Seller. Must upgrade phone OS.
Reviews.Author: Pedro B
Reviews.Content: The item arrived before the sheduled delivery date. Excellent customer support. In order to the phone battery last much more you must upgrade OS from 7.0 to 7.1. The phone is beautiful and the Blackberry OS7 experience is smooth and flawless. Glad I purchased this 9380.

Reviews.Title: Not worth of investing..!!
Reviews.Author: Bhumika
Reviews.Content: Hi Everyone,I had ordered this phone and received it withing 5 days.Talking about its body and design i must say its sleek and light.But again,there are minus points too.!! The phone heats up like  HELL when not in use also,and its battery finished very fast even if it is full and that i have not made any calls.So,im not satisfied with this phone and regret for buying it..!!

Reviews.Title: Very good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Hermana
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone new 18 months ago and am very happy with it. I have used it in both the U.S. and Mexico with no problems. The only shortcoming for me is that the camera takes adequate pictures but not excellent. This was my first smartphone and it was easy to learn and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: telefono
Reviews.Author: nelson marin
Reviews.Content: muy buen producto, excelente vendedor, entrega rapida y efectiva, me llego en excelente condiciones, agradecido por tan buen servicio prestado

Reviews.Title: Satisfecho con el Telefono que compre Excelente puntuacion maxima :)
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: Me encanto muchisimo el telefono. Lo recomiendo 100% buena venta de parte de ustedes, totalmente conforme y agradecido por el producto. sigan asi. "Exitos"  :D

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Pacheco
Reviews.Content: It is an excelent product.It is worth the purchase.I would recomend this one for everybody.Let's keep buying

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: angel garcias
Reviews.Content: me llego el envio segun la fecha que estaba pautado, me gustaria que hicieran envios internecionales por ups seria una gran ayuda

Reviews.Title: 3G
Reviews.Author: Pregunta
Reviews.Content: este equipo trabaja con 3G para digitel GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - HSDPA 850 / 1900 / 2100 o HSDPA 800 / 1900 / 2100 o HSDPA 900 / 1700 / 2100 para Venezuela
